detectors.description:
OwnedProxyWithReference (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.10/4ed3477307f64ff9ee2a26b693fbead4cf2af226_PoolFactory.sol/4ed3477307f64ff9ee2a26b693fbead4cf2af226_PoolFactory.sol#235-423) is an upgradeable proxy.
implementation was found in a different contract.
implementation is an address state variable.
ImplementationReference.implementation (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.10/4ed3477307f64ff9ee2a26b693fbead4cf2af226_PoolFactory.sol/4ed3477307f64ff9ee2a26b693fbead4cf2af226_PoolFactory.sol#197) gets value from a cross-contract call: ImplementationReference(implementationReference).implementation()
ImplementationReference appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of ImplementationReference is loaded from storage slot implementationReferencePosition = keccak256(bytes)(trueFiPool.implementation.reference)
Missing compatibility check in ImplementationReference.setImplementation(address)
To remove upgradeability, delete setImplementation from ImplementationReference
